
```{r}
bats = read.csv("data/raw/bats/all_bats.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

bats$percent_tag = bats$tag_wt/bats$body_wt * 100

summary(bats$body_wt)
summary(bats$percent_tag)
summary(as.factor(bats$sex))

table1::table1(~ factor(sex) + body_wt + percent_tag,  data=bats)
table1::table1(~ factor(sex) + body_wt + percent_tag | sex,  data=bats)
```
